original_text: So Jesus had compassion on them, and touched their eyes: and immediately their eyes received sight, and they followed him.
korean_text: 예수께서 불쌍히 여기사 그들의 눈을 만지시니 곧 보게 되어 그들이 예수를 따르니라

sentences.original_text: So Jesus had compassion on them,
and immediately their eyes received sight,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 즉시 그들의 눈이 보게 되었고
